TopicTitle: [MOD] DrBurndred's Fully Operational Hydrogen fuel kit

Articles.Content:
Just post what you think of my first mod

Post any bugs or anything

Get it here - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/beta-drburndreds-fully-operational-hydrogen-rocket-kit-small/
Pictures? Personally I don`t like downloading things `blind`

Pictures? Personally I don`t like downloading things `blind`

Agreed....

Next, what is in the kit?
Stock fuel tanks and rockets built to work on hydrogen. Nothing fancy.
I wonder when will special hydrogen tanks for NERVA rockets be added. That would increase the complexity, but I'm ok with that.
